trans-unit.source: Enables data-bound control containers to identify a data item object for simplified data-binding operations.

Container classes that implement the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface can specify which of their properties identifies the data item for data-binding operations, such as late binding with the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinder> class.
When implemented, gets an `object` that is used in simplified data-binding operations.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItem%2A> property identifies an object that is used in data-binding operations and late-binding expressions.
An `object` that represents the value to use when data-binding operations are performed.
When implemented, gets the index of the data item bound to a control.

In implementing classes such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex%2A> property is used to determine the index of the data item bound to the control from the data source.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex%2A> property does not refer to the index of the data item as displayed by the data control.
An `Integer` representing the index of the data item in the data source.
When implemented, gets the position of the data item as displayed in a control.

In implementing classes such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex%2A> property is set according to the index of the row among the displayed rows.
An `Integer` representing the position of the data item as displayed in a control.
